SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Class PlayerBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.observer.Observable
it.polimi.ingsw.model.player.PlayerBoard
public class PlayerBoard extends Observable
This class represents the area of the whole game table related to a single player.

  • Field Details

    • board

      public final Map<Coords,PlayableCard> board
      Player's board. Implemented as a map from coordinates to played card.

    • cardsPlacementOrder

      public final Map<Integer,Pair<PlayableCard,Coords>> cardsPlacementOrder
      Map containing information on the order of cards placement.

    • playerElements

      public final Map<Elements,Integer> playerElements
      Number of elements available on the board.

  • Constructor Details

    • PlayerBoard

      public PlayerBoard(StarterCard starterCard, CardSide starterCardSide, List<Observer> observers, AtomicInteger lastEventId)
      Parameters:
      starterCard - starter card of the player's board
      starterCardSide - side of the starter card to play
      observers - list of observers
      lastEventId - integer used to uniquely identify events

  • Method Details

    • adjacentCards

      public Map<CornerPosition,PlayableCard> adjacentCards(Coords coords)
      Allows to draw the list of cards placed around the coordinates given.
      Parameters:
      coords - coordinates of a position
      Returns:
      A map containing non-null adjacent cards

    • adjacentCorners

      public Map<CornerPosition,Corner> adjacentCorners(Coords coords)
      Allows to draw the list of corners around the coordinates given.
      Parameters:
      coords - coordinates of a position
      Returns:
      A map containing non-null adjacent corners

    • adjacentCoords

      public Map<CornerPosition,Coords> adjacentCoords(Coords coords)
      Allows to draw a list of coordinates around the coordinates given.
      Parameters:
      coords - coordinates of a position
      Returns:
      A map containing the adjacent coordinates

    • availableCoords

      public List<Coords> availableCoords()
      Used to draw all available slots for card placement.
      Returns:
      list of available coords

    • canPlaceCardAt

      public boolean canPlaceCardAt(Coords coords, PlayableCard card, CardSide side)
      Used to draw whether a card can be placed in a certain position. It checks all adjacent corners and if the player has enough resources to play the card.
      Parameters:
      coords - coordinates to check
      Returns:
      true if the card can be placed, false otherwise

    • updatePlayerElements

      public void updatePlayerElements(PlayerToken playerToken, Coords coords)
      Updates playerElements after placing the card at coords. Must be called after successfully placing a card.
      Parameters:
      playerToken - token of the player
      coords - coordinates of the placed card

    • getCard

      public PlayableCard getCard(Coords coords)
      Returns the card at the given coordinates. Coords must not be null.
      Parameters:
      coords - coordinates of the card
      Returns:
      card in given coordinates

    • placeCard

      public void placeCard(PlayerToken playerToken, Coords coords, PlayableCard card, CardSide cardSide)
      Sets the given card at the given position, sets adjacent corners to covered, updates the map with cards placement order.
      Parameters:
      playerToken - token of the player placing the card
      coords - coordinates where to place the card
      card - card to place
      cardSide - side of the card played
